menu.description: Hello! My name is Tomer. I am a developer, problem-solver, and all-around cool guy (call me biased..). You should take a look around and check out some of my projects! Feel free to drop me a line.

general.title: A Few Facts About Me
list: I am fluent in English and Hebrew - שלום! Though I'm pretty sure my mother tongue is PHP.

I'm an entrepreneur; besides starting my own company (visit Projects for more details), I've attended Triangle Startup Weekend thrice (and won 3rd place and people's choice at Triad SW!) and volunteered at Triangle Entrepreneurship Week.
I was on the front page of a newspaper! It's true!
I am a certified football soccer referee.
I look both ways before crossing a one-way street.
My favorite color is green, and has been since I first watched the movie Flubber.
general.personal_quote: I love software development because it gives me the opportunity to develop unique and creative solutions to problems.
